doc.after: The Real Academia Espa ola Royal Spanish Academy founded in 1713 234 together with the 21 other national ones see Association of Spanish Language Academies exercises a standardizing influence through its publication of dictionaries and widely respected grammar and style guides 235 Because of influence and for other sociohistorical reasons a standardized form of the language Standard Spanish is widely acknowledged for use in literature academic contexts and the media
